Detailed Description

Base class for many of the alarms. Holds an array of counts, an array of "armed" and some other common state.

BOOL INSTLIB::ARMED_COUNT::CounterAdvanceCheckNThreads ( THREADID  tid,
UINT32  LowTid,
UINT32  HighTid,
INT64  ninst = 1 
) [inline]

Advance the counter and check whether the alarm should fire. If a TID range was specified, the alarm will fire only after all the threads in the range have advanced past the specified count.

Returns:
True if the alarm fires and should call its handler.
